mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SCATEGOTY (S_NO, S_NAME, S_YEAR, S_QUARTER, S_MONTH, S_DAY, L_NO) VALUES (SEQ_S_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sName}, #{sYear}, #{sQuarter}, #{sMonth}, #{sDay}, #{lNo})
mapper.select: SELECT S.S_NO, S.S_NAME, S.S_YEAR, S.S_QUARTER, S.S_MONTH, S.S_DAY, S.L_NO, L.L_NAME, L.JOB_NO, J.JOB_NAME, J.JG_NO, G.JG_NAME FROM TBL_SCATEGORY S, TBL_LCATEGORY L, TBL_JOB J, TBL_JOBGROUP G WHERE S.L_NO = L.L_NO AND L.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND J.JG_NO = G.JG_NO
SELECT S.S_NO, S.S_NAME, L.L_NAME, J.JOB_NAME, G.JG_NAME FROM TBL_SCATEGORY S, TBL_LCATEGORY L, TBL_JOB J, TBL_JOBGROUP G WHERE S.L_NO = L.L_NO AND L.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND J.JG_NO = G.JG_NO
SELECT JOB_NO, JOB_NAME, JG_NO FROM TBL_JOB WHERE JG_NO = #{jgNo}
SELECT L_NO, L_NAME, JOB_NO FROM TBL_LCATEGORY WHERE L_NO = #{lNo}
